ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to support the Governmentâ€™s commitment to protect Canadians from child, early, and forced marriage by raising the age of a spouse and to no longer recognize, for immigration purposes, marriages in which one or both parties were not physically present.
